item.title: 希腊表示，埃克森美孚牵头的财团将继续在克里特岛附近进行天然气地震研究
item.description: 希腊周四表示，以埃克森美孚为首的财团将进入第二阶段的地震研究，以便在希腊克里特岛附近的一个区块进行天然气勘探。【原文：An ExxonMobil-led consortium will move to the second phase of seismic research for gas exploration in a block off the Greek island of Crete, Greece said on Thursday.】

item.title: 全球需求降温，中国 9 月出口可能进一步放缓
item.description: 中国 9 月份的出口增速可能是 5 个月来最慢的，这表明制造商不再急于在几个贸易伙伴加征关税之前发出订单，而且全球对中国商品的需求正在疲软。【原文：China's exports are likely to have risen at the slowest pace in five months in September, suggesting manufacturers are no longer rushing out orders ahead of tariffs from several trade partners and that global demand for Chinese goods is softening.】

item.title: 丰田汽车董事长警告：未来转向纯电动汽车将导致失业
item.description: 丰田汽车公司董事长周四表示，转向纯电动汽车的未来将导致从事发动机相关技术工作的人员失业，包括该行业的许多供应商。【原文：A shift to an electric vehicle-only future would lead to job losses among those who have been working on engine-related technologies, including at the many suppliers in the sector, Toyota Motor's chairman said on Thursday.】

item.title: 谷歌诺贝尔奖获得者引发人工智能研究辩论
item.description: 本周，诺贝尔化学奖和物理学奖授予了少数与谷歌有关联的人工智能先驱，这引发了人们对谷歌公司研究主导地位以及如何认可计算机科学突破的讨论。【原文：The award this week of Nobel prizes in chemistry and physics to a small number of artificial intelligence pioneers affiliated with Google has stirred debate over the company's research dominance and how breakthroughs in computer science ought to be recognised.】

item.title: 需求疲软导致第三季度梅赛德斯-奔驰汽车销量下滑
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）汽车制造商周四表示，第三季度汽车销量略有下降，原因是需求疲软（尤其是在亚洲）超过了产品供应的改善。【原文：Mercedes-Benz saw a slight drop in cars sales in the third quarter as weaker demand, particularly in Asia, outweighed improved product availability, the carmaker said on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道：芬兰富腾电力公司的电力资产成为监控和网络攻击的目标
item.description: 芬兰最大的电力公司富腾（Fortum）首席执行官告诉路透社记者，该公司的能源资产受到了卫星干扰，周围发现了无人机和可疑人员，而且每天都受到拒绝服务攻击。【原文：Finland's largest power utility Fortum has experienced satellite disturbances, spotted drones and suspicious individuals around its energy assets and been targeted with daily denial-of-service attacks, its chief executive told Reuters.】

item.title: 受中国市场影响，宝马第三季度销量下降 13%，交付停止
item.description: 德国高档汽车制造商宝马汽车公司周四表示，受中国市场表现疲软以及因集成制动系统（IBS）问题而停止交付的影响，该公司第三季度销量下降。【原文：BMW sales fell in the third quarter, weighed down by weak performance in China and delivery stops due to problems with the integrated braking system (IBS), the German premium carmaker said on Thursday.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克就 8 万例 Zantac 诉讼达成和解后股价开盘走高
item.description: 英国制药商葛兰素史克同意支付高达 22 亿美元的赔偿金，以了结声称其停产的胃灼热药物 Zantac 会致癌的诉讼，根据周四的盘前迹象，葛兰素史克的股价上涨了 5%。【原文：Shares of GSK are seen rising 5% according to pre-market indications on Thursday after the British drugmaker agreed to pay up to $2.2 billion to settle lawsuits that claimed its discontinued heartburn drug Zantac caused cancer.】

item.title: 日本股市创六个月来最大单周外资流入量
item.description: 截至 10 月 5 日的一周内，外国投资者增加了对日本股票的购买，原因是首相石破茂发表鸽派言论后日元走软，提振了对当地出口商的投资热情。【原文：Foreign investors increased their purchases of Japanese stocks in the week ended Oct. 5, as the yen weakened following Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba's dovish remarks, boosting appetite for local exporters.】

item.title: 日本央行可能并不像上田的谨慎言论所暗示的那样鸽派
item.description: 日本经济状况的改善和美国经济衰退忧虑的消退，很可能会使 12 月或 1 月加息的前景重新回到人们的视野中，即使新政府的上台使围绕货币政策的政治变得更加复杂。【原文：Japan's improving economic conditions and receding U.S. recession worries are likely to bring prospects of a December or January interest rate hike back into view, even as a new government complicates the politics around monetary policy.】

item.title: 优衣库所有者 Fast Retailing 全年利润增长 31%，超出预期
item.description: 日本服装品牌优衣库（Uniqlo）的所有者 Fast Retailing 周四公布，受国际业务利润率扩大的推动，该公司连续第三年实现创纪录的盈利。【原文：Japan's Fast Retailing , owner of clothing brand Uniqlo, booked its third consecutive year of record earnings on Thursday, boosted by widened profit margins in its international segments.】

item.title: 瑞银 IT 总监称瑞信整合 "目标明确
item.description: 瑞银集团技术主管告诉路透社，在成功试运行后，瑞银集团将前竞争对手瑞士信贷的客户和数据与自身平台整合的工作 "进展顺利"。【原文：UBS's integration of former rival Credit Suisse's clients and data with its own platforms is "bang on target" after a successful test run, its tech chief told Reuters.】

item.title: 独家报道：中国奇瑞在西方竞争对手撤出的俄罗斯工厂组装汽车
item.description: 五位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，中国汽车制造商奇瑞已开始在大众和奔驰等西方竞争对手腾出的三家工厂组装汽车，并在俄罗斯销售。【原文：Chinese carmaker Chery has started assembling cars in Russia for sale in the country at three factories vacated by Western rivals including Volkswagen and Mercedes , five people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 欧洲首次公开募股在秋季卷土重来
item.description: 欧洲的首次公开募股（IPO）在经历了夏季的沉寂之后，正在慢慢复苏。【原文：Initial public offerings (IPOs) are slowly coming back in Europe after a summer lull.】

item.title: 美国大选潜在争议带来的风险成为市场关注的焦点
item.description: 美国总统大选选情紧张，导致一些投资者担心选举结果不明朗或有争议，从而绊倒今年股市的强劲涨势。【原文：A tight U.S. presidential race is leading some investors to brace for an unclear or contested election result that could trip up this year’s booming stock market rally.】

item.title: 力拓的真正财富：Arcadium 的锂提取技术
item.description: 力拓斥资 67 亿美元收购 Arcadium 公司后，将获得一整套锂过滤技术，有望彻底改变电子和电动汽车行业生产锂金属的方式。【原文：Rio Tinto's $6.7 billion buyout of Arcadium will give it a suite of lithium filtration technologies that are poised to revolutionize how the metal is produced for the electronics and electric vehicle industries.】

item.title: 早间竞价中国股市狂欢再起，关注周六走势
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 香料和调味品生产商 Givaudan 因需求强劲第三季度销售额超出预期
item.description: 瑞士香料和调味品生产商 Givaudan 周四公布的第三季度销售额高于分析师预期，原因是其市场需求持续高涨。【原文：Swiss fragrance and flavour maker Givaudan reported third-quarter sales above analysts' expectations on Thursday, driven by sustained high demand across its markets.】

item.title: 如果特朗普在 11 月 5 日获胜，他将如何全面改革美国金融监管机构？
item.description: 如果共和党前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在 11 月 5 日的美国大选中获胜，预计他将迅速全面改革美国的金融监管机构，在民主党总统乔-拜登（Joe Bidenh）的领导下，金融监管机构对银行、私人基金和其他贷款机构实施了一系列严格的新规定。以下是特朗普在2025年1月20日上任后如何控制这些机构。【原文：If Republican former President Donald Trump wins the U.S. election on Nov. 5 he is expected to swiftly overhaul the country's financial regulators, which under Democratic President Joe Bidenhave pursued a slew of stringent new rules for banks, private funds and other lenders. Here's how Trump could take control of the agencies upon taking office on Jan. 20, 2025.】

item.title: 在乌克兰取得成功后，Anduril 将销售价格低廉的小型无人机
item.description: 安杜里尔工业公司（Anduril Industries）周四发布了用于情报搜集和执行致命任务的新型自主无人机，以利用乌克兰同类产品的成功刺激的激增需求，这些无人机比战斗机便宜得多。【原文：Anduril Industries released new, autonomous drones on Thursday for intelligence gathering and lethal missions, to take advantage of surging demand spurred by the success of similar products in Ukraine that are much cheaper than fighter jets.】

item.title: 报告称，尽管股市势头强劲，但风险资本投资者对交易持谨慎态度
item.description: 根据PitchBook-NVCA周四发布的一份报告，在经济不确定的情况下，美国风险资本投资者对交易仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Venture capital investors in the United States remained cautious about dealmaking amid economic uncertainty, according to a PitchBook-NVCA report released on Thursday, underscoring challenges in the industry despite a rally in public markets.】

item.title: 读卖新闻》称，Seven & i 可能为非核心资产成立控股公司
item.description: 据《读卖新闻》周四报道，Seven & i Holdings 正在探讨为其超市、餐饮部门和非核心资产成立一家中间控股公司，以吸引外部投资，并专注于便利店业务。【原文：Seven & i Holdings is exploring establishing an intermediate holding company for its supermarket, restaurant arms and non-core assets to attract external investment and focus on its convenience store operations, the Yomiuri newspaper reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 亚马逊在美国将 Apple TV+ 添加到 Prime Video 流媒体服务中
item.description: 亚马逊周三表示，Apple TV+ 将于本月晚些时候在美国的 Prime Video 上推出，月费 9.99 美元。【原文：Amazon said on Wednesday that Apple TV+ will become available on Prime Video later this month in the U.S. for $9.99 per month.】

item.title: 中国股市攀升；美元在美国通胀测试前持稳
item.description: 由于中国央行启动了 5000 亿元人民币的融资机制以刺激资本市场，周四亚洲股市从中国股市中获得提振，而美元则在当天晚些时候美国通胀数据公布前徘徊在两个月高点附近。【原文：Asian stocks got a lift on Thursday from Chinese stocks as China's central bank kicked off its 500 billion yuan facility to spur capital markets, while the dollar lingered near a two-month high ahead of U.S. inflation data later in the day.】

item.title: 辉瑞前高管未参与 Starboard 针对制药商的竞选活动
item.description: 辉瑞公司前首席执行官兼董事长伊恩-雷德（Ian Read）和前首席财务官弗兰克-达梅利奥（Frank D'Amelio）在一份声明中表示，他们不会参与激进投资者 Starboard Value 的投资，Starboard Value 希望这家美国制药巨头做出改变，扭转业绩。【原文：Pfizer's former CEO and Chair Ian Read and ex-CFO Frank D'Amelio said in a statement that they will not be involved with activist investor Starboard Value, which wants the U.S. drug giant to make changes to turn its performance around.】

item.title: 受飓风米尔顿影响，130 多万佛罗里达用户停电
item.description: 根据 PowerOutage.us 提供的数据，由于飓风米尔顿以 3 级风暴登陆佛罗里达州，周三有 130 多万户家庭和企业停电。【原文：More than 1.3 million homes and businesses in Florida were without power on Wednesday, as Hurricane Milton made landfall as Category 3 storm, according to data from PowerOutage.us.】

item.title: 印度监管改革可加速即将上市的初创企业回家进程
item.description: 银行家、律师和投资者认为，印度取消一个耗时的合规步骤，将加快在国外注册的印度初创企业回国参与该国上市热潮的步伐。【原文：India's scrapping of a time-consuming compliance step will accelerate the pace at which Indian startups domiciled abroad shift back home to participate in the country's listing boom, according to bankers, lawyers and investors.】

item.title: 条款表显示，伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司在债券交易中融资 19 亿美元
item.description: 据路透社周四查阅的一份条款书显示，沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）在一项七期日元债券交易中筹集了 2818 亿日元（19 亿美元）。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway has raised 281.8 billion yen ($1.9 billion) in a seven-tranche yen-denominated bond deal, according to a term sheet reviewed by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 以色列-伊朗冲突担忧和美国风暴导致油价上涨
item.description: 周四，油价在亚洲早盘交易中上涨，原因是人们担心中东可能出现供应中断，以色列计划打击石油生产国伊朗，以及一场大风暴肆虐佛罗里达州导致燃料需求激增。【原文：Oil prices rose in early Asian trade on Thursday on concerns about potential supply disruptions in the Middle East, with Israel planning to strike oil-producer Iran, and on spikes in fuel demand as a major storm barreled into Florida.】

item.title: 美元徘徊在两个月高位附近，美联储宽松政策押注在通胀数据公布前消退
item.description: 美元兑主要货币周四接近两个月来的峰值，因为市场对美联储进一步放宽货币政策的耐心态度越来越有信心，即使当天晚些时候即将公布一份关键的通胀报告。【原文：The U.S. dollar traded near a two-month peak against major peers on Thursday as markets grew more confident about a patient approach from the Federal Reserve to further monetary easing, even as a key inflation report loomed later in the day.】
